08-29-2024: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Crow Familiar|Size=20} Crow Familiar Spirit Power duration scaling reduced from 0.05 to 0.04
- Fixed left clicks sometimes deselecting the ability when charges aren't ready
08-15-2024: - Added a sound for movement being restricted by {AbilityIcon|Ability=Slowing Hex|Size=20} Slowing Hex and Vindicta tether
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Stake|Size=20} Stake base duration reduced from 2.5s to 2.25s
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Stake|Size=20} Stake T1 duration reduced from 1s to 0.75s
08-01-2024: - Gun damage growth increased from 0.85 to 1.0
07-11-2024: - Fixed Vindicta's {AbilityIcon|Ability=Stake|Size=20} Stake sometimes moving units that aren't supposed to be moved

- Fixed the following abilities changing their launch direction if the player snapped their camera quickly during the cast time: Ivy's Kudzu Bomb, Paradox's {AbilityIcon|Ability=Pulse|Size=20} Pulse Grenade, Warden's Alchemical Flask, Vindicta's Stake, Alchemical Fire (T3 Weapon item)
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Crow Familiar|Size=20} Crow Familiar duration spirit power scaling reduced from 0.07 to 0.05
- Gun damage growth increased from 0.7 to 0.85
06-27-2024: - Base movement speed increased from 7 to 8
- Fixed {AbilityIcon|Ability=Crow Familiar|Size=20} Crow Familiar T1 only bouncing to 1 additional target instead of 2
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Assassinate|Size=20} Assassinate zoom level is reduced a bit
06-20-2024: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Crow Familiar|Size=20} Crow Familiar debuff duration increased from 5s to 6s
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Assassinate|Size=20} Assassinate bonus damage increased from 130 to 145
06-06-2024: - Added Vindicta {AbilityIcon|Ability=Assassinate|Size=20} Assassinate sound effect for targeted players
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Flight|Size=20} Flight spirit bonus damage reduced from +12 to +10
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Flight|Size=20} Flight no longer has +10% bonus range to damage falloff
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Flight|Size=20} Flight T2 changed from +12 Spirit Damage to -15s Cooldown
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Flight|Size=20} Flight T3 changed from +3 m/s Bonus Air Speed to +12 Spirit Damage
- Can no longer melee while flying for extra movement
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Assassinate|Size=20} Assassinate now ramps up its total damage from 50% to 100% over 1 second of being zoomed (UI indication for this)
- Fixed being unable to move while scoped in with {AbilityIcon|Ability=Assassinate|Size=20} Assassinate
05-30-2024: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Flight|Size=20} Flight no longer grants +1 bonus air speed
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Flight|Size=20} Flight falloff damage increase reduced from +20% to +10%
- Fixed flight spirit damage being able to pierce {AbilityIcon|Ability=Metal Skin|Size=20} Metal Skin
05-23-2024: - Improved Vindicta’s {AbilityIcon|Ability=Stake|Size=20} Stake effects to make it a little clearer when you are affected
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Crow Familiar|Size=20} Crow Familiar T3 improved from -30% Healing Suppression to -40%
05-16-2024: - Vindicta's {AbilityIcon|Ability=Crow Familiar|Size=20} Crow Familiar projectile effect indicates the radius more accurately now
- Fixed {AbilityIcon|Ability=Vindicta|Size=20} Vindicta being able to shoot above the base wall
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Flight|Size=20} Flight spirit bullet damage now has range effectiveness (previously the magic bullets did max damage from any range)
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Flight|Size=20} Flight spirit damage per bullet increased from 8 to 12
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Flight|Size=20} Flight T2 bonus spirit damage per bullet increased from 8 to 12
05-03-2024: - Base Bullet Damage reduced from 15 to 14
- Bullet Damage gained per boon reduced from 0.88 to 0.7 (these are gained occasionally as you earn souls, up to 11 times)
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Stake|Size=20} Stake T1 bonus duration reduced from +1.5s to +1.0s
- Is now a recommended hero for new players
